00007   Offset::Offset(const char* string)
00008   : line(0), column(0)
00009   {
00010     *this = inc(string, string + strlen(string));
00011   }
00012 
00013   Offset::Offset(const string& text)
00014   : line(0), column(0)
00015   {
00016     *this = inc(text.c_str(), text.c_str() + text.size());
00017   }

00019   Offset::Offset(const size_t line, const size_t column)
00020   : line(line), column(column) { }

00022   // init/create instance from const char substring
00023   Offset Offset::init(const char* beg, const char* end)
00024   {
00025     Offset offset(0, 0);
00026     if (end == 0) {
00027       end += strlen(beg);
00028     }
00029     offset.add(beg, end);
00030     return offset;
00031   }
00032 
00033   // increase offset by given string (mostly called by lexer)
00034   // increase line counter and count columns on the last line
00035   // ToDo: make the col count utf8 aware
00036   Offset Offset::add(const char* begin, const char* end)
00037   {
00038     if (end == 0) return *this;
00039     while (begin < end && *begin) {
00040       if (*begin == '\n') {
00041         ++ line;
00042         // start new line
00043         column = 0;
00044       } else {
00045         ++ column;
00046       }
00047       ++begin;
00048     }
00049     return *this;
00050   }
00051 
00052   // increase offset by given string (mostly called by lexer)
00053   // increase line counter and count columns on the last line
00054   Offset Offset::inc(const char* begin, const char* end) const
00055   {
00056     Offset offset(line, column);
00057     offset.add(begin, end);
00058     return offset;
00059   }
00060 
00061   bool Offset::operator== (const Offset &pos) const
00062   {
00063     return line == pos.line && column == pos.column;
00064   }
00065 
00066   bool Offset::operator!= (const Offset &pos) const
00067   {
00068     return line != pos.line || column != pos.column;
00069   }
00070 
00071   void Offset::operator+= (const Offset &off)
00072   {
00073     *this = Offset(line + off.line, off.line > 0 ? off.column : column + off.column);
00074   }
00075 
00076   Offset Offset::operator+ (const Offset &off) const
00077   {
00078     return Offset(line + off.line, off.line > 0 ? off.column : column + off.column);
00079   }
00080 
00081   Offset Offset::operator- (const Offset &off) const
00082   {
00083     return Offset(line - off.line, off.line == line ? column - off.column : column);
00084   }

00109   {
00110     Offset::add(begin, end);
00111     return *this;

00114   Position Position::inc(const char* begin, const char* end) const
00115   {
00116     Offset offset(line, column);
00117     offset = offset.inc(begin, end);
00118     return Position(file, offset);
00119   }
